sentences: Tema seisis tee 채채res ja ootas.
Lapsed seisid r천dul ja vaatasid alla t채navale.
Meie koer seisis ukse ees ja naksas.
context: 'Seisis' is the past tense third person singular form of the Estonian verb 'seisma', which means 'to stand'. It describes someone or something that was in a standing position at a specific time in the past. This word is commonly used to describe people, animals, or objects that were positioned vertically on their feet or base.
